MoneyLog
Experience ][ ?

regex


MoneyLog Experience 2: Track your finances the practical way. Think simple! Learn more...

  • Overview : Global summarized incoming, expenses and balance, by month.
  • Recent Only: See only the latest data, ignoring oldies.
  • Show Monthly Partials Shows the monthly balance, with sums of your incoming and expenses on the period.

  • Search field: Filter the reports in real time, as you type.
  • regex: Use regular expressions on the search field.
  • Question mark: Show/hide this help text.

Tip: On the reports, click the column header to sort the results. Click again for reverse sorting.

Instructions: Save this page, use a plain text editor to add your own transactions and open it on the browser.

MoneyLog Experience 2: Acompanhe suas finanças de maneira simples e prática. Descomplique! Saiba mais...

  • Relatório Geral: Resumo de seus ganhos e gastos, com média e acumulado.
  • Somente Recentes: Veja somente os dados mais recentes, ignorando os antigos.
  • Mostrar Parciais Mensais: Mostra o saldo mensal e o acumulado, com somatórios de ganhos e gastos.

  • Caixa de pesquisa: Filtra os relatórios em tempo real, de acordo com o que você digita.
  • regex: Usa expressões regulares na caixa de pesquisa.
  • Interrogação: Mostra e esconde este texto de ajuda.

Dica: Nos relatórios, clique no título da coluna para mudar a ordenação. Clicando novamente a ordem é invertida.

Instruções: Salve esta página, use um editor de textos para colocar seus lançamentos e abra no navegador. 



# Change this data by yours, separated by TABs
# Again: Separated by TABs, not spaces
# The date is on the YEAR-MONTH-DAY format

2007-02-01	-100.00	My initial balance :(
2007-02-07	-25.00	Energy
2007-02-07	-20.00	Water
2007-02-15	-74.23	Supermarket
2007-02-15	- 1.99	My new mouse 10/12
2007-02-23	-39.90	"Gremlins Horoscope" book

2007-03-03	-142.59	One Shrubbery
2007-03-07	-20.00	Energy
2007-03-07	-17.80	Water
2007-03-11	  5.00	I've won that bet with John
2007-03-12	-40.00	Ascii Art Tux 3D poster
2007-03-15	- 1.99	My new mouse 11/12
2007-03-29	-95.67	Supermarket

2007-04-07	-29.00	Energy
2007-04-07	-32.37	Water
2007-04-12	-199.90	Used Segway on E-bay
2007-04-15	- 1.99	My new mouse 12/12 (paid!)

2007-05-07	-25.00	Energy
2007-05-07	-30.00	Water

# The order is not important. you can join together the recurring transactions
2007-02-05	300.00	Salary
2007-03-05	300.00	Salary
2007-04-05	300.00	Salary
2007-05-05	300.00	Salary


# Use and abuse from blank lines and spaces. they're ignored
2007-04-20	   -    10.00	    Dinner on downtown

# Future transactions! (commented)
# 2009-12-31	+99.99	Bonus
